Description: Houses and a ruined wall on a hill; a tall house with loggia beneath the roof, a steep slope below, walls and houses in the background Brush drawing in grey-brown wash, over black chalk
Bibliographic references: Hind 1915-31 / Catalogue of Dutch and Flemish Drawings preserved in the Department of Prints and Drawings in the British Museum (11)
Exhibition history: 2004-2005 Oct-Jan, Birmingham, Barber Inst of Fine Arts, 'Bartolomeus Breenbergh 'Joseph in Egypt'
